Name: Bold Colors
Definition / Description: Saturated, high-contrast palette that commands instant attention (zekagraphic.com)
Notable Characteristics: Electric hues, large type, simple shapes
Strengths: • Stop-scroll power • Strong recall • Works in small creatives
Weaknesses (Avoid): • Visual fatigue • Off-brand risk • Overwhelms dense info

Name: Minimalist
Definition / Description: Strips visuals to the bare essentials for maximum clarity (venngage.com)
Strengths: • Premium feel • Fast comprehension • Focus on message
Weaknesses (Avoid): • Can look empty • Relies on copy • Less emotive
Compatible Media: Single Image, Document Ad, Conversation Ad

Name: Authentic UGC
Definition / Description: Raw, user-generated look that boosts relatability and trust (theshelf.com)
Strengths: • High trust • Low cost • Social proof
Weaknesses (Avoid): • Quality varies • Hard to script • Brand clash risk
Compatible Media: Short-Form Video, Single Image, Conversation Ad

Name: Illustration-Led
Definition / Description: Custom illustrations simplify abstract ideas in a playful way (lummi.ai)
Weaknesses (Avoid): • Time-intensive • Risk childish look • Less serious

Name: Cinematic
Definition / Description: High-definition visuals with dramatic framing and motion graphics (designshack.net)
Strengths: • Premium perception • Emotional impact • Great for demos
Weaknesses (Avoid): • High cost • Needs subtitles • Large files
Compatible Archetypes: Product Demo, Founder Story, Case Study

Name: Infographic
Definition / Description: Data visualised with charts and icons for quick scanning (venngage.com)
Weaknesses (Avoid): • Info overload • Needs fresh data • Wide files hurt mobile

Name: Glassmorphism
Definition / Description: Frosted-glass blur layers add depth and modern sheen (designstudiouiux.com)
Strengths: • Premium look • Depth without clutter • Highlights CTAs
Weaknesses (Avoid): • GPU heavy • Trend fatigue • Low contrast risk
Compatible Archetypes: Product Demo, Lead Magnet, Event Invite

Name: 3D / CGI
Definition / Description: Photoreal or stylised 3-D renders create immersive scenes (comintedlabs.io)
Strengths: • High wow factor • Explains complex products • Future-oriented
Weaknesses (Avoid): • Expensive • Longer render times • Can feel artificial

Name: Gradient Overlay
Definition / Description: Smooth multicolor blends add energy and depth to designs (kittl.com)
Strengths: • Modern vibe • Guides eye • Easy brand tie-in
Weaknesses (Avoid): • Muddy text risk • Dates quickly • Needs contrast checks

Name: Duotone
Definition / Description: Visuals limited to two bold hues for striking contrast (99designs.com)
Strengths: • Strong identity • Low file size • High legibility
Weaknesses (Avoid): • Limited palette • Risk flatness • Needs colour harmony

Name: Dark Mode
Definition / Description: Light text and accents on dark backgrounds for eye comfort (bluecompass.com)
Strengths: • Stands out in feed • Feels techy • Saves OLED power
Weaknesses (Avoid): • Can hide shadows • Colour shift issues • Not print-friendly

Name: Retro / Vintage
Definition / Description: Nostalgic visuals evoke past decades and warm memories (veranda.com)
Notable Characteristics: Grain textures, warm tones, classic fonts
Weaknesses (Avoid): • Can feel dated • May alienate • Needs authenticity

Name: Motion Graphics
Definition / Description: Animated typography and icons convey info rapidly (designshack.net)
Strengths: • High engagement • Explains fast • Retargetable viewers
Weaknesses (Avoid): • Needs captions • Complex production • Distraction risk

Name: Isometric
Definition / Description: 30° pseudo-3D angle shows systems and workflows clearly (designshack.net)
Weaknesses (Avoid): • Repetitive if overused • Needs precision • Hard small-scale

Name: Hand-Drawn Sketch
Definition / Description: Loose pen-or-brush illustrations feel personal and human (lummi.ai)
Weaknesses (Avoid): • Can seem amateur • Less scalable • Colour matching issues
